meanings.definition: A small piece of waste material produced by punching a hole.
meanings.sent1: I found a tiny chad on the floor after using the hole punch.
meanings.sent2: The office was covered in chads after a busy day of paperwork.
meanings.sent3: The chad decided to start a rebellion against the paper shredder.
meanings.sent4: The chads scattered like confetti as the hole puncher went wild.
meanings.sent5: Stepping on a chad feels like walking on a crunchy leaf.
